testcase.name: Verify in eBay website whether the price of product is "$190.00"
testcase.system-out: Given User is signal-telecom homepage.......................................passed And the user click on the button of eBay Page...............................passed And the user selects the newly opened Signal Telecom's eBay Page............passed And the user search in eBay Store for "GRANDSTREAM GXW4104".................passed Then verify the product is same............................................passed Then verify whether the price of product is "$190.00".......................passed
